Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after); ROMAN PERIOD (not before)
Name: Human figurine
Description: Figurine representing a nude woman lying on a roughly hewn bed. She wears a tripartite wig. Her arms are alongside her body. The work is crude. Compare this terracotta with L 2079.
